title: Causes of women in workforce 20th century

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the factors that led to the expansion of women’s participation in the paid workforce in Europe over the course of the twentieth century.

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the factors that led to the expansion of women’s participation in the paid workforce in Europe over the course of the twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
